Texts.Chs: 把^orange;蜂蜜酒^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;mead^reset; to ^green;the drunk^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

I's not able ter *hic* do much ter help. Make ^green;mead^reset;. Hard work. You'll need to find shome ^orange;Pure Honey^reset; and purpare fer a complimicated brewing process. Bring some for me to *hic* taste when you're done!

Texts.Chs: 你真的做到了！现在你可以称呼自己为酿酒大师了。
Texts.Eng: You did it. Now you can truly call yourself a brewer.
